meanings.sent1: He made the schmuckiest mistake by wearing mismatched shoes to the party.
meanings.sent2: It was the schmuckiest decision to trust a known liar.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at juggling eggs was the schmuckiest thing I've ever seen.
meanings.sent4: She felt like the schmuckiest player on the team after missing the winning shot.
meanings.sent5: The schmuckiest move in the game was walking straight into the enemy's trap.

meanings.sent1: The sound of the dripping faucet was the schmuckiest noise in the quiet room.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with his constant complaints was the schmuckiest part of her job.
meanings.sent3: The schmuckiest moment of the day was when he accidentally hit 'reply all' to the email.
meanings.sent4: The schmuckiest mosquito kept buzzing around her head all night.
meanings.sent5: The schmuckiest song on the radio played for the third time in an hour.

meanings.sent1: He proved to be the schmuckiest builder when the roof collapsed the next day.
meanings.sent2: The schmuckiest driver on the road caused a traffic jam by going the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fix the computer himself only made him look even schmuckier.
meanings.sent4: She felt like the schmuckiest chef after burning the soup for the third time.
meanings.sent5: The schmuckiest employee managed to spill coffee on important documents during the meeting.
